mapper.select: SELECT cd.id, cd.state, cd.useDate, cd.userId, cd.couponId, c.name AS cname, c.discount AS cdiscount, c.regdate AS cregdate, c.expirDate AS cexpirDate, c.expirYN AS cexpirYN FROM coupondetail cd INNER JOIN coupon c ON cd.id = c.id WHERE cd.id = #{id}
